Title: Otsuki-sama to Oujo
Description: ['Sachiko is unhappy and doesn\'t have a lot of energy. One day, a white rabbit appears and takes her to the "Land of the Moon." There, she meets her "true self," a happy and healthy girl, and Sachiko realizes she can be just like her.']
Related: ['Prequel: Tamala 2010: A Punk Cat in Space']
